summary: This mod intends to add a challenge to Skyrim in form of weapon crafting. Only Legendary Weapons made of uniqe items.
descriptionHtml:
Version: Alpha 0.01 Uploaded for people who wanna try/test and give feedback :D

This Project was started about a month ago, it should have been updated alot more but i haven\'t had the time for it:( Atleast the Alpha is up for those who are interested.

The idea of this mod is to add several Legendary Weapons to Skyrim in a uniqe way of crafting them. Every weapon needs a certain unique item to be crafted that is obtained by scouring the lands and such or defeating certain opponents. 

I want this mod to be a sortof collector mod. Have you ever played Demon\'s Souls or Dark Souls? All weapons in those games were unique in that you have to aquire a certain soul from a certain boss and so on. In the end its a collectors game and you feel really proud when you have them all. I want to add that kinda feeling to Skyrim however making it more challenging.

 I intend to make all weapons only to be crafted once (hence Legendary) by adding materials only aquireable once, some maybe during a Main Quest sequence so that if youre already done that then youre screwed and such. A part which i liked about the aforementioned games.

Currently:

9 Weapons are avaible and the respective items can be found in the world. You need dragon smithing in order to craft each item. Can\'t figure out them enchants right, was much easier with the Oblivion Construction Kit, oh well. 

What to add/do:

-Hint Book
-Lore Book
-More Weapons
-Special Forge
-Fine tuning crafting recipies
-Fix and balance enchants

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Daggers
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: The Black Seal
Weapon Type: Dagger
Current Skin: Ebony Dagger
Material: Crystallized Hunger
Lore: Never full of it, the Crystallized Hunger is an appropriate name for the Soul Gem which never is filled. This dagger is born from the same hunger, sealing the very soul of its victim. Used by the sinister Necromancer, Surfk, he tried to fill the dagger with the souls of every living beign to appease Hermaeus Mora. He eventually took his own life with the dagger which shattered it into fragments and returned to its shape original shape. The dagger is bound to its master and should the bond ever be broken, so will the dagger.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
One Handed Swords
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: Ryu Metsu
Weapon Type: Katana
Current Skin: Akviri Katana
Material: Bolar\'s Oathblade
Lore: Wielded by the Grandmaster of the old Akaviri Dragonslayers. Aptly named Ryu Metsu  (Dragon Annihilator in Japanese according to Google Translate), every dragon it faced it slew. How powerful the Grandmaster was is not certain but he eventually fell to Alduin. Bolar knows little of his swords origin and it is infact the same blade yet unpolished.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: Core of Inferno
Weapon Type: Sword
Current Skin: Glass Sword
Material: Canister of Flame
Lore: One of three, these triplet swords were forged to the Three Knights of Elements. Three hero knights who togheter had journeyed near and far in search for a cure of a mysterios plague, they each wielded their own element. As gift of honor for completing their great mission these sacred swords were made. Each of the swords had a piece of each element imbued into their blades. A slither of the first flame, a piece of the magical ice of Loruun and a fragment of lightning, caught by a boys bare hands later using it to restore peace. Each of these majestic elements were stored in Canisters to hold forever. Alas only three remain, but where?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: Core of Ice
Weapon Type: Sword
Current Skin: Chillrend
Material: Canister of Cold
Lore: See Core of Inferno.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: Core of Thunder
Weapon Type: Sword
Current Skin: Chillrend
Material: Canister of Lightning
Lore: See Core of Inferno.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Two Handed Swords
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: Core of Elements
Weapon Type: Greatsword
Current Skin: Glass Greatsword
Material: Core of Inferno, Core of Ice, Core of Thunder
Lore: Should two of the Three Knights of Elements fall, the last surviving knight were to assume the role of the Knight of Element, safeguarding the kingdom of old. Fusing the triplets into one, creating an unstoppable force of lightning, fire and frost, this knight were to be unbeatable. Whatever happened to the Three Knights of Elements and the kingdom of old is knowledge lost to the world, only the blacksmith of old kept his records.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
One Handed Maces
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: Divine Wrath
Weapon Type: Mace
Current Skin: Ebony Mace
Material: Essence of Dawn
Lore: A wandering monk named Helfo Light once set out on a pilgrimage to cleanse the world of all the undead. His mace, Divine Wrath, had been bathed and imbued with holy power from every church he passed by. It crushed every undead it met. Helfo eventually grow old after wandering the world. He felt he couldnt go on much longer. During his travels he had crossed Skyrim, whichs landscapes were beautiful in Helfo\'s eyes. The monk had always loved the sea, so he sat down on the northern part of Skyrim, gazing over the sea. The put all his belongings in a nearby chest and sat there until he gently fell asleep. The mace, before the monks death, had been drained of its power and beign stored in a glowing lustrous white gem.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Name: Erngulf\'s Axe
Weapon Type: Waraxe
Current Skin: Dwarven Waraxe
Material: Nahagliiv\'s Eye
Lore: WIP

Name: Axe of Sovngarde UNAVIABLE
Weapon Type: Great Axe
Current Skin: Ancient Nordic Battleaxe
Material: Soul Gold
Lore: WIP

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This is what i have so far. I itend to put up many more, but currently i need to find some good hiding places for the materials!

You have any idea of a good balanced weapon i could add? In that case you can leave a comment.

Thanks for checking this out!

-Rammex
